widget.name: CSS Grid
widget.description: A powerful CSS Grid implementation for creating complex, responsive layouts

property.caption: Use Named Areas
property.description: Enable to use grid-area instead of grid-column/row for item placement

property.caption: Grid Template Columns
property.description: Default columns of the grid (e.g., "1fr 2fr 1fr" or "repeat(3, 1fr)")

property.caption: Grid Template Rows
property.description: Default rows of the grid (e.g., "auto 1fr auto")

property.caption: Grid Template Areas
property.description: Default named grid areas (each line in quotes, e.g., "header header" "sidebar content")

property.caption: Gap
property.description: Sets both row and column gaps (e.g., "16px" or "1rem")

property.caption: Row Gap
property.description: Sets the gap between rows (overrides gap property for rows)

property.caption: Column Gap
property.description: Sets the gap between columns (overrides gap property for columns)

property.caption: Min Width
property.description: Minimum width of the grid container

property.caption: Max Width
property.description: Maximum width of the grid container

property.caption: Min Height
property.description: Minimum height of the grid container

property.caption: Max Height
property.description: Maximum height of the grid container

property.caption: Justify Items
property.description: Aligns grid items along the row axis

property.caption: Align Items
property.description: Aligns grid items along the column axis

property.caption: Justify Content
property.description: Aligns the grid along the row axis

property.caption: Align Content
property.description: Aligns the grid along the column axis

property.caption: Auto Flow
property.description: Controls how auto-placed items flow in the grid

property.caption: Auto Rows
property.description: Sets the size of implicitly-created rows

property.caption: Auto Columns
property.description: Sets the size of implicitly-created columns

property.caption: Enable Container Breakpoints
property.description: Enable different grid configurations at various screen sizes
